description:
I just downloaded this and when I want to get the token for Slack it tells me this is the old way of integrating... 

"You're reading this because you're looking for info on legacy custom integrations - an outdated way for teams to integrate with Slack. These integrations lack newer features and they will be deprecated and possibly removed in the future. We do not recommend their use. "

Any plans to change how the slack-term integrates with Slack?
i download it for ubunutu and system dosent install it so i got to re install it
this should probably be removed from the snap store as i installed this and was unable to get it working properly with slack.
summary: I think this project is dead

description: According to the Slack web site, they no longer issue new tokens so that this can work. So if it's not working for you now, I guess it never will.
cannot get new tokens and is not supported by the slack system
After following instructions on the github page and trying serveral methods to linke my workspace. Ultimately no matter where I put my slack token slack-term couldn't find it. I gave up
